mapper.select: select res_seq, res_pesticide, res_rsvtime, user_id from t_reservation where user_id = #{user_id} and DATE_FORMAT(#{res_rsvtime},'%y/%M/%D') = DATE_FORMAT(res_rsvtime,'%y/%M/%D')
mapper.insert: insert into t_reservation (res_pesticide, res_rsvtime, user_id) values(#{res_pesticide},#{res_rsvtime}, #{user_id})

insert into t_diary(diary_title, diary_content, diary_dt, diary_id, diary_temp, diary_humid, diary_percent, diary_pesti, diary_cnt) values(#{diary_title} ,#{diary_content},#{diary_dt},#{diary_id},#{diary_temp} ,#{diary_humid} ,#{diary_percent} ,#{diary_pesti},#{diary_cnt});
